Question & Options:
Which statements accurately describe the relationships among the locations mentioned?
Options:
A. A) Tepeji Street is part of Colonia Roma.
B. B) Colonia Roma is a neighborhood in Mexico City.
C. C) Mexico City is located within the country of Mexico.
D. D) Tepeji Street is a major highway in Mexico.
Correct Answer: A) Tepeji Street is part of Colonia Roma., B) Colonia Roma is a neighborhood in Mexico City., C) Mexico City is located within the country of Mexico.
